column4: I just found out there is a "Xubuntu".  Is there anything specific about it that would make me want it?
Fryguy: do I just use apt-get and install xfce if I would want to?  is it very different from GNOME?
xfce is much more lightweight and much less featured than gnome or kde, it's usually only used by people with low-spec systems
so basically it isnt as pretty as GNOME or KDE?
